publicationStmt.publisher: Collaboratory for Writing and Research on Culture (CWRC https://cwrc.ca) and Linked Editing Academic Framework (LEAF https://leaf-vre.org).

sourceDesc.p: This template was created by members of CWRC and LEAF.

projectDesc.p: This template is made available for use with the LEAF-Writer semantic editor.
